hanzi-su-wiki:
舎

Значения

Дом, постройка, квартира

Мнемоника

Искажено. Единство (равносторонний треугольник сверху) стен 囗 и травы 屮. Хижина из смеси глины и соломы. Используется также в качестве уничижительного (вежливого) притяжательного местоимения первого лица (мой, моё).

Варианты

舍

舍舍RS舎house, dwelling, dwell, reside

heisig_constituent: cottage, umbrella, earthenware jar, lidded crock, soil, dirt, ground, mouth
heisig_story: A lidded crock with an umbrella overhead gives us a mixture of the modern and the nostalgic in this design for a cottage.
myStory:
все старое, ничего нового

глиняный горшок под зонтиком
koohiiStory1: The cottage is so small - it has an umbrella for the roof; soil for the floor and room for only one mouth.
koohiiStory2: My vacation cottage is nothing but a hole in the ground covered by an umbrella.
jp_example_words:
校舎(こうしゃ): school building
田舎(いなか): the country, country side
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The kanji and the radical that look like this are exactly the same. They are both cottage.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: As long as you know the radical cottage, you know the kanji cottage.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You got this cottage from a shaman (しゃ). In fact, everyone you know got their cottage from a shaman. One day you're just walking in the woods, and the next thing you know, a shaman is giving you the keys to their old cottage.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: I guess shamans are moving out a lot around here. Why don't you go look for a cottage you can buy from a shaman! I bet you'll get a pretty good, totally not cursed, deal!
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 口 (рот), 土 (земля)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ground (土) where the man (𠆢) keeps the mouth (口) is a house

shè
яп. вм. 舍
Radicals: 舎  (cottage)
Meaning Mnemonic
The kanji and the radical that look like this are exactly the same. They are both cottage.
As long as you know the radical cottage, you know the kanji cottage.
Reading Mnemonic
You got this cottage from a shaman (しゃ). In fact, everyone you know got their cottage from a shaman. One day you're just walking in the woods, and the next thing you know, a shaman is giving you the keys to their old cottage.
I guess shamans are moving out a lot around here. Why don't you go look for a cottage you can buy from a shaman! I bet you'll get a pretty good, totally not cursed, deal!
